SELECT
`sakila`.`film`.`film_id` AS `FID`, `sakila`.`film`.`title` AS `title`, `sakila`.`film`.`description` AS `description`, `sakila`.`category`.`name` AS `category`, `sakila`.`film`.`rental_rate` AS `price`, `sakila`.`film`.`length` AS `length`, `sakila`.`film`.`rating` AS `rating`, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(UPPER(SUBSTR(`sakila`.`actor`.`first_name`, 1, 1)), LOWER(SUBSTR(`sakila`.`actor`.`first_name`, 2, LENGTH(`sakila`.`actor`.`first_name`))), _utf8mb4 ' ', CONCAT(UPPER(SUBSTR(`sakila`.`actor`.`last_name`, 1, 1)), LOWER(SUBSTR(`sakila`.`actor`.`last_name`, 2, LENGTH(`sakila`.`actor`.`last_name`)))))) SEPARATOR ', ') AS `actors` FROM ((((`sakila`.`category` LEFT JOIN `sakila`.`film_category` ON ((`sakila`.`category`.`category_id` = `sakila`.`film_category`.`category_id`))) LEFT JOIN `sakila`.`film` ON ((`sakila`.`film_category`.`film_id` = `sakila`.`film`.`film_id`))) JOIN `sakila`.`film_actor` ON ((`sakila`.`film`.`film_id` = `sakila`.`film_actor`.`film_id`))) JOIN `sakila`.`actor` ON ((`sakila`.`film_actor`.`actor_id` = `sakila`.`actor`.`actor_id`))) GROUP BY `sakila`.`film`.`film_id` , `sakila`.`category`.`name` HAVING `sakila`.`film`.`rating` IN ('G', 'PG');
SELECT film_id, title FROM film WHERE title="${boolArray}xyz${charArray}";
SELECT actor_id, first_name, last_name FROM actor WHERE actor_id IN ${value};
